alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 12:31AM PST until March 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches between 7000 and 9000 feet through tonight. Another 6 to 12 inches Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday. Higher amounts near the Sierra Crest. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph today and tonight. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, winter clothing, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
